docs.title: oct-schema
docs.text:
Data standards for coral research and conservation

URI: https://w3id.org/OpenCoralTools/oct-schema

Name: oct-schema

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description OrganizationRegisterEntry Represents an entry in the organization registry Record Base class for all records InventoryRecord Base class for inventory items that have URL paths Coral Represents a specific coral instance Event Represents an event in the system history Genet Represents a genetic individual Location Represents a group of items or a container within a site Organization Represents an organization Site Represents a physical site Person Represents a person (user) Species Represents a species SpeciesRegisterEntry Represents an entry in the species registry

docs.title: Slots
docs.text: Slot Description accession_number Accession number if applicable capacity Capacity of the group clonal_id Clonal ID if applicable common_name Common name of the species contact_email Contact email for the organization coral_size Size of the coral coral_type_id ID of the coral type created_at Timestamp when the record was created created_by_id ID of the user who created the record description Description of the entity domain Domain name associated with the organization email Email address of the user event_type_id ID of the event type genet_id ID of the genet genet_type_id ID of the genet type genus The genus name group_id ID of the group/location group_id_hierarchy Hierarchy of group IDs group_type_id ID of the group type id Unique identifier for the record image_url URL to the user's image internal_path Internal path structure is_active Whether the organization is active logo_url URL to the organization's logo name Name of the entity organization_id ID of the organization this record belongs to parent_id ID of the parent entity photo_url URL to a photo of the species quantity Quantity of items record_id ID of the record associated with the event record_model_type Type of the record model region Geographical region of the organization scientific_name Full scientific name (genus + specific epithet) sf_id SeaFoundry ID site_id ID of the site this entity belongs to site_type_id ID of the site type site_type_ids List of site type IDs supported by the organization slug URL friendly identifier part species_id ID of the species species_ids List of species IDs supported by the organization specific_epithet The specific name (second part of the binomial name) tags Tags associated with the species updated_at Timestamp when the record was last updated updated_by_id ID of the user who last updated the record url_path URL friendly path to this resource website_url Website URL of the organization
